contribution_desc: This poster reports an asynchronous multi-device acoustic localization system. It seems there is no novel contribution in this poster paper, but I have labelled it "tagged" as one given it a "1" because the localization problem is relevant to cross-device interaction.
device_models: Vega No.6 Galaxy Nexus; Odroid XU; Galaxy S3
tracking_characteristic: Tracking devices only; Location 3D; Inside-out tracking
